title: How to Feng Shui Your Car

steps.title: Wash the exterior of your car
steps.content: Wash the exterior of your car every 2 weeks so it's always clean. Dirt and grime can attract negative chi, so keep the exterior of your car clean. Hand wash it using a bucket of soapy water and a garden hose. Alternatively, go to a car wash for an easier option. After you wash your car, use a soft towel to buff it dry so the water doesn't leave streaks. [1] X Research source You may need to wash your car more often if it gets dirty quickly. For instance, if you often drive down dirt roads, your car will likely need weekly washings.

steps.title: Remove trash and clutter from your car so your chi can flow.
steps.content: Remove trash and clutter from your car so your chi can flow. According to feng shui, clutter and debris clogs up your chi and prevents it from flowing freely. Clean out your car, including the consoles and glove box, and carefully evaluate each item before putting it back into your vehicle. Keep only what you need in your car, and place each item in a designated space so your car is organized. [2] X Research source Each time you get out of your car, take any trash with you so it doesn’t become clutter inside your vehicle. You might keep a reusable trash bag in your car so you can easily collect and remove the trash.

steps.title: Vacuum the carpet and seats monthly to remove dirt and debris.
steps.content: Vacuum the carpet and seats monthly to remove dirt and debris. The interior of your car is going to get dirty with regular use. To keep it clean, use a vacuum with a hose attachment or a handheld vacuum to clean the carpet and seats. Pay special attention to under the seat, cracks, and crevices where debris tends to accumulate. [3] X Research source A dirty interior attracts negative energy, so it’s important to keep your car as clean as possible. If you have a job or hobby that causes you to bring a lot of dirt into your car, vacuum the interior more frequently as needed.

steps.title: Wash your windows
steps.content: Wash your windows weekly so they stay clean. In feng shui, your windows are considered the eyes of your car, so it’s important they be clear. If your windows are dirty, you won’t have a good vision of what’s ahead of you. Use window cleaner or a squeegee once a week to keep your windows sparkling clean. [4] X Research source If someone leaves fingerprints or a smudge on your windows, remove them immediately rather than waiting for your weekly cleaning.

steps.title: Play calming or uplifting music to purge the negative energy.
steps.content: Play calming or uplifting music to purge the negative energy. Music that you find energizing or relaxing helps chase away negative chi while also boosting your positive chi. Generally, any music that makes you feel good will work, but it’s best to avoid songs about violence or negative topics. Turn the music on when you get in your car. [5] X Research source Create a playlist for your car so it's easy to create the energy you want in your car. If a song is making you feel sad or angry, switch to a happier tune so your chi remains positive.

steps.title: Salt your floorboards to absorb negative energy.
steps.content: Salt your floorboards to absorb negative energy. Salt is an earth element that’s known for its cleansing properties. To get the benefits of salt inside your vehicle, lightly sprinkle it over your floorboards. Leave the salt in place until your next vacuuming so it can absorb negative energy. [6] X Research source Replace the salt each time you vacuum. If you prefer not to sprinkle salt on your floors, place the salt in a gauze pouch and place it under your seat or in your console.

steps.title: Keep a bottle of water in your car for clarity and cleansing.
steps.content: Keep a bottle of water in your car for clarity and cleansing. In feng shui, water is very important because it cleanses everything and represents understanding. According to feng shui, placing water in your car washes away the negative energy and helps you “see” with clarity. Bring a bottle of water with you inside your car each time you drive it. [7] X Research source It’s okay to drink the water! Carry your reusable bottle with you and refill it as needed.

steps.title: Turn off any electrical devices that you don't need while driving.
steps.content: Turn off any electrical devices that you don't need while driving. Electrical devices emit energy that can create negative chi, especially if you have multiple devices in a small space. When you get into your car, power down any devices that you're not using for a GPS or music playlist. If you are using a device, try to limit yourself to 1 at a time. [8] X Research source For instance, you might use your phone for a GPS and music so you don't need to use 2 devices.

steps.title: Maintain your car so that it doesn't get out of balance.
steps.content: Maintain your car so that it doesn't get out of balance. It's important to keep your car in good working order so it stays balanced. If you have imbalance in your car's mechanical system, fluid levels, or tires, it'll create disharmony in your car. Do the following tasks to keep your car in good working order: [9] X Research source Get regular oil changes. Top off your fluids as needed. Check your tires monthly to make sure the treads aren't worn. Keep your tires at the proper air pressure. Address service lights as soon as they come down. Get your car checked by a mechanic once a year.

steps.title: Spritz your car with a peaceful or uplifting aromatherapy scent.
steps.content: Spritz your car with a peaceful or uplifting aromatherapy scent. Make sure the air in your car smells fresh at all times by using aromatherapy. Place an aromatherapy car diffuser inside your vehicle or use a spritz bottle to fill your car with lovely scents. You can use any smell that appeals to you, but here are some great options: [10] X Research source Sage for cleansing Lemon for cleansing and energy Orange blossom for positive energy

steps.title: Place a stone or crystal in your car to keep you grounded.
steps.content: Place a stone or crystal in your car to keep you grounded. Stones and crystals are also tied to the earth element, so they help you maintain stability and can be protective. Place any natural stone or crystal in a secure place in your car for good vibes. For instance, you might place the stone in your console or cup holder. [11] X Research source Pick a stone or crystal that you’re drawn to for best results. Use your intuition! Crystals can also bring positive energy into your car. For instance, choose citrine for positive vibes, black tourmaline for protection, or clear quartz because it can be used for any intention. [12] X Research source

steps.title: Decorate your car with positive or protective symbols only.
steps.content: Decorate your car with positive or protective symbols only. While you don’t want a lot of clutter, it’s good to have some decorations. This might include a rearview mirror accessory, window or bumper stickers, or a steering wheel cover. Pick images that make you feel happy or uplifted. Alternatively, choose words or images of protection. [13] X Research source Traditionally, the dragon is a very lucky symbol in Chinese culture. However, you can use any symbol that feels positive to you. For instance, you might prefer to incorporate a peace sign or a tree of life. If you’re religious, you might include a symbol from your faith, like praying hands. Protective words like “Drive safely” or “Baby on board” help keep your car protected.

steps.title: Use a protective talisman for extra protection.
steps.content: Use a protective talisman for extra protection. A talisman is something that draws luck while also driving away negativity. Anything can be a talisman, so choose something that feels lucky to you. Here are some ideas: [14] X Research source Keep a small representation of your spirit animal in your car, like a decal on your dashboard or a small stuffed toy keychain. Hang a colorful beaded necklace that brings you joy from your rearview mirror. Place lucky stones and a set of prayer beads in a pouch and keep it in your glove box. Hang a colorful tassel with lucky charms on it from your rearview mirror.

steps.title: Incorporate your lucky colors to draw positive energy to you.
steps.content: Incorporate your lucky colors to draw positive energy to you. The best way to choose colors for your vehicle is to pick what you’re drawn to. Focus on what makes you feel relaxed and happy because those are the right colors for you. However, you might prefer to pick colors based on what they represent. Here are the meanings of the colors: [15] X Research source White: Purity, clarity Green: Nature, fresh, prosperity Yellow: Optimism, cheer Orange: Positivity, energy Blue: Calm, cold Purple: Royalty, power, creativity Red: Passion, vigor, war, anger Black: Mystery, death, protection

steps.title: Attract positive vibes using feng shui numbers.
steps.content: Attract positive vibes using feng shui numbers. In feng shui, each number has a meaning that you can use to attract the right type of energy into your life. Incorporate these numbers in your license plate if you want a vanity plate. Otherwise, include the numbers in your decor by placing beads or stickers in your car. Based on feng shui, here are the meanings of the numbers: [16] X Research source 1 - Independence, strength, energy 2 - Lightness, softness 3 - Activity, speed 4 - Death 5 - No meaning 6 - Abundance, richness 7 - Irritability, moodiness, no confidence 8 - Good luck, wealth, prosperity 9 - Love, longevity
